name: messaging-app

scripts.dev: nodemon --exec node --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"));' backend/src/index.ts
scripts.start: node --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"));' backend/src/index.ts

author: nicholas levine
description: A messaging app built with Node.js and TypeScript
